name: Dragonheir's False Fin
description: A piece of biological tissue that you found after defeating the BathysmalVishaps.  Although it looks like a fin of some kind, it does not actually have anyfunction at all.  The people of Byakuyakoku once investigated the Bathysmal Vishaps quitedeeply. Their most distinctive feature was the ability to choose what traitsit wished to pass on to its offspring. Because of their great hatred for man-made light sources, these vishaps will lose any visual acuity by the time theyreach maturity. At the same time, they have also evolved a certain degree ofelemental polymorphism for combat purposes.
